label: IndexerCurrentState
description: Represents all of the state that defines and dictates the indexer's current execution.

fields.label: Mode
fields.tooltip: The mode the indexer is running in.

fields.label: All Docs Initial Tracking State
fields.tooltip: Change tracking state used when indexing starts on all documents in the datasource.

fields.label: All Docs Final Tracking State
fields.tooltip: Change tracking state value when indexing finishes on all documents in the datasource.

fields.label: Reset Datasource Document IDs
fields.tooltip: The list of datasource document ids that have been reset. The datasource document id is the unique identifier for the data in the datasource. The indexer will prioritize selectively re-ingesting these ids.

fields.label: Reset Document Keys
fields.tooltip: The list of document keys that have been reset. The document key is the document's unique identifier for the data in the search index. The indexer will prioritize selectively re-ingesting these keys.

fields.label: Reset Docs Initial Tracking State
fields.tooltip: Change tracking state with which indexing starts on select, reset documents in the datasource.

fields.label: Reset Docs Final Tracking State
fields.tooltip: Change tracking state value when indexing finishes on select, reset documents in the datasource.

fields.label: Resync Initial Tracking State
fields.tooltip: Change tracking state used when indexing starts on selective options from the datasource.

fields.label: Resync Final Tracking State
fields.tooltip: Change tracking state value when indexing finishes on selective options from the datasource.
